title: #273: Dark Secrets Of The Mormon Church | Derrick Broze
description:
Organized religion has been used for centuries to control the masses through fear and superstition, and nowhere has that been more evident than in the mysterious Mormon Chuch where troubling allegations have recently come to light that cast a dark shadow on Salt Lake City.

Tales of sexual abuse are nothing new to churches of many denominations, but the Church of Jesus Christ of Latter Day Saints, otherwise known as the LDS or Mormon Church, has recently been in the headlines for being involved with Satanic activities and child rape. Investigative journalist Derrick Broze takes a deep dive into what the truth is, how long these activities have been going on, who is involved in covering it up, and how far up the crimes against children actually go.
